criteria: All core AWS infrastructure (VPC, RDS, ECS, Cognito) is successfully provisioned via Terraform. Initial FE/BE projects are committed.
success_metrics: 100% of planned infrastructure is provisioned and verified.

gate_name: Sprint 2 Quality Gate: CI/CD & Registration Live
criteria: CI/CD pipeline successfully deploys to staging. All security scans are passing. New users can successfully register an account.
bypass_criteria: Non-critical security findings can be accepted with a remediation plan.
success_metrics: Zero-touch deployment is achieved. Registration E2E test passes.

gate_name: Sprint 3 Quality Gate: Core Calculator Ready
criteria: 85% backend unit test coverage met. All core calculator E2E tests passing. User login is functional and secure.
success_metrics: All core scientific calculator functions are verified as correct.

gate_name: Sprint 4 Quality Gate: Persistence & Modes Creation
criteria: All data persistence APIs (variables, history, modes) are functional. Account deletion is verified. Custom mode wizard is fully functional.
success_metrics: User can create and save a fully-defined custom mode.

gate_name: Sprint 5 Quality Gate: v1.0 Release Candidate
criteria: Security review of sandbox is complete and approved. Offline sync passes all data integrity tests. Application passes WCAG 2.1 AA audit.
bypass_criteria: Minor accessibility issues can be moved to post-launch backlog with approval.
success_metrics: Zero critical bugs. All NFRs are met. Application is feature-complete for v1.0.
